falstad

Class DefaultViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • falstad.DefaultViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Viewer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirstPersonDrawer, MapDrawer, MazeView

    public class DefaultViewer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Viewer
    This is a default implementation of the Viewer interface with methods that do nothing but providing debugging output such that subclasses of this class can selectively overwrite those methods that are truly needed. TODO: use logger instead of Sys.out
    Author:
    Kemper

      • redraw

        public void redraw(java.awt.Graphics gc,
          Constants.StateGUI state,
          int px,
          int py,
          int view_dx,
          int view_dy,
          int walk_step,
          int view_offset,
          RangeSet rset,
          int ang)
        Description copied from interface: Viewer
        Updates what is on display on the screen. The behavior depends on the particular state of the maze. Classes that implement this interface use the state parameter to recognize if they should react to the method call or ignore it.
        Specified by:
        redraw in interface Viewer
        Parameters:
        gc - graphics handler for the buffer image that this class draws on
        state - is the state of the maze
        px - x coordinate of current position, only used to get viewx
        py - y coordinate of current position, only used to get viewy
        view_dx - view direction, x coordinate
        view_dy - view direction, y coordinate
